title: portable charger, power bank, I-Bollon 8000 MAH two output fast charging external battery charge for iPhone, iPad, Samsung, cell phone.(Black)
feature: PORTABLE COMPACT EXTERNAL BATTERY - Tough Material, anti-finger and super lightweight. Only palm size, ultra-compact for your bag purse. Moreover, 4 status LEDs indicate remaining capacity. It has auto-shutoff function after 1 minute if no charging device connected.
HIGH CAPACITY & COMPATIBILITY - 8000mAh high-capacity and dual-port charger can charge at least an iPhone 6 three times, a 6 Plus or Galaxy S6 two times, as well as many other smart devices.
DUAL PORTS - ultra-compact 8,000mAh capacity Power bank with dual USB outputs which quickly and effectively help solve low power problem.
GUARANTEE SAFTY - Supports over-charged, over-discharged, over-voltage, over-current and short circuit protection, perfectly protects your digital devices from charging accident.
WARRANTY GUARANTEE - We give our customer 12 months’ warranty with friendly customer service. 30 days’ unconditional replacement or money back guarantee.
description: Marooned in transit forget your OEM adapter? With the I-Bollon power bank, prolong your battery lifetime wherever you are. Holding enough power to charge most smartphones, keep your gadgets going for days and still have juice left to share. With its portable and ultra-slim design and 8000mah battery capacity, it is the perfect companion for a day out without adding an extra weight. Intelligent makes slim juice Smart and Easy In addition to capacity, the I-Bollon portable external battery sports high-speed simultaneous ports. So whether you're charging an Apple or Android device, you'll get the most out of your technology. Weight: 7.5 oz Dimension: 5.4 x 3 x 0.8 inches Chemistry: Li-polymer Battery Capacity : 8000mAh Output Power : DC 5V/1A , DC 5V/2.1A (Max) Input Power: Micro USB 5V / 1A/2A Rechargeable: Yes Charging Life Cycle: Over 500 times Recharging Time: Around 8-10 hours (Via 1A Adaptor) * 8000mAh Power Bank x 1 * USB Charger Cable x 1 *User manual x1
